caption.title: Mean percent change heatwave-related excess deaths in 2031–2080 in comparison to 1971–2020, in 20 countries/regions under RCP2.6, RCP4.5, RCP6.0, and RCP8.5 scenarios and high-variant, median-variant, and low-variant population scenarios, with assumption of nonadaptation.
caption.p:
The high–low line indicates 95% eCI. Please refer to Table C in
S1 Appendix for effect estimates. eCI, empirical confidence interval; RCP, Representative Concentration Pathway.
